display_long_description: Bird Runners VR is a multiplayer virtual reality game that lets players experience life as a bird, using innovative arm-based locomotion to run, jump, climb, and glide through dynamic environments. Inspired by games like Gorilla Tag, it focuses on physics-based movement, allowing players to master traversal skills and compete in various game modes. Whether exploring open worlds, engaging in high-speed chases, or socializing in lobbies, players can customize their bird characters with unique cosmetics. The game encourages fast-paced, skill-based gameplay while fostering a fun and interactive community. With frequent updates, new maps, and game modes, Bird Runners VR offers an ever-evolving experience for players looking to test their agility and reflexes. Designed for VR platforms, it supports online multiplayer, allowing friends to team up or compete in exhilarating challenges.
